Package controllers

Class LoginController

Object
LoginController
public class LoginController extends Object
Handles user authentication and post-login redirection based on user role.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected static final IAuthorisationService
    loginService
    The LoginService instance to be used for login operations.
    private static final Scanner
    scanner
    The scanner to be used for user input.

    Method
    Description

    changePassword(Account account)
    Facilitates changing of a user's password.
    private static void
    handlePostLogin(Account account)
    Handles actions to be taken immediately after successful login, such as prompting for password change if the default password is detected or redirecting the user based on their role.

    login()
    Initiates the login process.

      The scanner to be used for user input.

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginController

      public LoginController()

  • Method Details

    • login

      public static void login()
      Initiates the login process. Continuously prompts for user credentials until login succeeds or the user decides to exit.

    • handlePostLogin

      private static void handlePostLogin(Account account)
      Handles actions to be taken immediately after successful login, such as prompting for password change if the default password is detected or redirecting the user based on their role.
      Parameters:
      account - The account of the user who has just logged in.

    • changePassword

      protected static void changePassword(Account account)
      Facilitates changing of a user's password.
      Parameters:
      account - The user's account for which the password is to be changed.

    • redirect

      private static void redirect(User user)
      Redirects the user to the appropriate controller based on their role.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be redirected.
